member.name: WICJpegYCrCbSubsamplingOption
member.summary: Specifies the JPEG YCrCB subsampling options.

member.name: WICJpegYCrCbSubsamplingOption.WICJpegYCrCbSubsampling420
member.summary: Subsampling option that uses both horizontal and vertical decimation.

member.name: WICJpegYCrCbSubsamplingOption.WICJpegYCrCbSubsampling422
member.summary: Subsampling option that uses horizontal decimation .

member.name: WICJpegYCrCbSubsamplingOption.WICJpegYCrCbSubsampling444
member.summary: Subsampling option that uses no decimation.

member.name: WICJpegYCrCbSubsamplingOption.WICJpegYCrCbSubsampling440
member.summary: Subsampling option that uses 2x vertical downsampling only. This option is only available in Windows 8.1 and later.
